thread: Dahlia and Alessa.It is definitely those two.

name: Page 5
thread: "I was shocked to realize the talisman of Metraton was being used.In spite of the lost soul returning at last. Just a little longer and allwould have been for naught.

name: Page 6
thread: It's all because of that man.We must be thankful to him.Even though Alessa has been stopped, his little girl has to go. What a pity..."

name: Page 7
thread: Dahlia still has not noticed me.I boldly walk toward Dahlia, and I scream at her.

name: Page 8
thread: "Stop this! Dahlia!"Dahlia shows no compunction or surprise, and turns to face me with a calmexpression on her face.

name: Page 9
thread: "Well, well, well. To think you'd make it this far.""Where's Cheryl!? What have you done to her!?"

name: Page 10
thread: "What are you talking about?You've seen her many times?Restored to her former self.""I'm in no mood for jokes."I didn't understand what she was saying.

name: Page 11
thread: "Don't you see? She's right there."Right there?Only Alessa, draped in her blue clothing, is where Dahlia is pointing.

name: Page 12
thread: "That's absurd.""You are the only one who thinks so.""Why? Why are you doing this?"

name: Page 13
thread: "It's been a long seven years...For the seven years since that terrible day, Alessa has been kept alive,suffering a fate worse than death.

name: Page 14
thread: Alessa has been trapped in an endless nightmare from which she neverawakens.He has been nurtured by that nightmare.Waiting for the day to be born.That day has finally come.The time is neigh.

name: Page 15
thread: Everyone will be released, from pain and suffering.Our salvation is at hand. This is the day of reckoning.When all our sorrows will be washed away.When we return to the true paradise!My daughter will be the mother of God!"

name: Page 16 (Dahlia, Mother Alessa, and Harry in final area)
thread: At about the exact time I began to speak another voice drowned mine out."Quit screwing around! Return things to how they were before!""Kaufmann!"

name: Page 17 (Kaufmann in final area)
thread: Dr. Michael Kaufmann stood there out of breath, as if he had just arrivedin time.

name: Page 18
thread: "Did I ask for this!Nobody uses me!You won't get away with this!"

name: Page 19
thread: "Your role is over.We don't need you anymore.What do you think you can accomplish by coming here?"

name: Page 20
thread: A smile appears on Kaufmann's face and he reaches into his pocket."My, aren't we getting cocky?Bet you can't see this and keep your cool."

name: Page 21 (Red bottle in black bag)
thread: The item that Kaufmann pulled out of his pocket...It is definitely the small bottle that I found in the gas tank of themotorcycle that was in that garage somewhere.

name: Page 22
thread: "Aglaophotis! I thought I got rid of that!""All I had to do was plant it somewhere for you to find. You, all, well, itkept you busy.Ha! You're easy! And there's more where this came from!"

name: Page 23 (Black)
thread: "Stop it!!"Kaufmann throws the small bottle at Alessa.All four of us watch the bottle fly in a beautiful parabola, our eyesfixed on the sacred liquid within.

name: Page 24
thread: There is tension.Although she is normally calm and composed, that drug is enough to frightenDahlia.That small bottle hit a part of Alessa's body, shattered into pieces, andsoaked Alessa uncomfortably with the red liquid that was inside.

name: Page 25 (Alessa with red stained clothes in final area)
thread: Dahlia looks completely emaciated as she watches the whole thing.However, not me, nor anyone could have predicted the situation that came outof that event.(Incubus is born)

name: Page 26 (Black)
thread: Alessa's back splits open, and a giant creature the likes of which I havenever seen before tears through the cloth of the one piece dress Alessa iswearing. It looks like an insect breaking out of its cocoon as it is beingborn.

name: Page 27 (Close up of Incubus)
thread: It has large wings and a head like a bull, and with its green musclesswelling it rose up and out of its mother's body, Alessa. And then it letout an earthshakingly brutal evil cry, and looked down at us.

name: Page 28
thread: "Huh? What the!?"I yell out, not addressing anyone in particular."What on earth? That's not supposed to..."Kaufmann just stands there in utter amazement, as the eventsunfold unlike how he had expected.

name: Page 29
thread: "It's awakening!It's awake!Now no one can interfere!"Dahlia, in a fit of insanity, had a feeling that could not be describedas pleasant or angry.

name: Page 30
thread: "Cheryl!!"I call my daughter's name one more time."Give up!That person no longer exists.This is a God!Descended among us to reach out and save us!"

name: Page 31 (Black) (Cheryl appears)
thread: I edge up to Alessa, the mother's body that has been cast off.And there I see Cheryl, about to fade away as always.

name: Page 32 (Black) (Cheryl walks away)
thread: "Thank you Daddy. Goodbye"I am certain that is what she said to me."Cheryl?Can't be?You can't leave like this..."

name: Page 33
thread: Cheryl is already beginning to run away from me.

name: Page 34
thread: "This can't be happening? Cheryl! Cheryl!?"I yell out.The figure of my daughter, who I have been searching for, gradually dissolvesinto the darkness just like the figure I saw when I first arrived inSilent Hill.

name: Page 35
thread: "Cheryl!! Wait......"

name: Page 36 (Incubus, animated)
thread: Then electricity overflowed from the entire body of the creature that wasborn from Alessa. It divided into several lighting bolts, which struckabove my head.

name: Page 37
thread: I run about trying to escape.However, that band of electricity follows me, and constantly appears in frontof me.

name: Page 38
thread: I have began to sweat, and it is getting in my eyes.If I keep running about like this I will be beaten.

name: Page 39
thread: I vaguely think, even if it means that Cheryl will not come back, by killingthis conceptually evil creature the situation will clearly improve forthe better.

name: Page 40
thread: I ready my weapon.During the short time between the lighting strikes I fire many bulletsinto the creature's body,

name: Page 41
thread: During that short time from when it spreads its large wings and becomesready to strike I do not even think about ceasing my attack.

name: Page 42
thread: Cheryl's smile flits through the back of my mind.What was it that she wanted?When we decided to travel to Silent Hill, you were the one to suggest it,right Cheryl?

name: Page 43
thread: Were you called here, or did you wish to come here of your own will?

name: Page 44
thread: Cheryl, I loved you more than anyone, and I still do even now.That is the truth.However, I must bury this creature.

name: Page 45
thread: I must make up for the sins that Cheryl took from me.And then, when the final bullet penetrated its body...

name: Page 46
thread: It lost the means to keep its body together, and finally the piecesof its body fell apart and dissolved into the darkness...It was completely gone.

name: Page 47 (Black)
thread: The large space begins to shake heavily.A loud horrifying noise rises up from the below, and with it my existenceis thrown from dimension to dimension, and I feel pain just being there.

name: Page 48 (Alessa in burning final area)
thread: Fire has broken out in various places in the area, and I can tell that thisspace as well as the entire town are on the verge of collapsing.Alessa lies on her stomach in the center of the space, and she shows no signof moving from there.

name: Page 49
thread: She is just protecting her entire body in a bird-like manner. Shedesperately holds out the new life that is just below her abdomen towards me.

name: Page 50
thread: I run over to Alessa.A pained expression rises on Alessa's face as she hands the newborn babyto me.

name: Page 51
thread: The hell fires burn with force and spread around, and my life is threatened.There is not enough time left to try and rescue Alessa from here.

name: Page 52
thread: I hold the baby she gave me tightly to my chest, and begin to run from thistwisting space in search of somewhere safe.

name: Page 53
thread: I do not look back.Why did Alessa entrust this small life born from her at the end to me?I have no idea.

name: Page 54
thread: But I have a feeling that I am obligated to raise this child.

name: Page 55 (Staircase to freedom)
thread: Behind me an explosion occurs.I run.All I can do is continue to run.
